name: Sega Master System
nativeRgbOutput: with the right cable, the Master System model 1 will output an RGB signal without modification. The Master System 2 requires a modification to do this.

details: Sega Master System RGB SCART Cable
notes: all Genesis cables can be used with the Master System using the Genesis 2 Adapter
the MK-2000 will not use any of these options as it has no RGB output
